title: Manage an Open House
description: An agent is holding an open house. They need to market it and manage sign-ins.

tasks.description: Schedule the open house for Saturday from 1-4 PM in the MLS.
tasks.expected_outcome: The open house event is successfully added to the MLS listing.

tasks.description: Create a digital sign-in form for the event.
tasks.expected_outcome: A web form to capture visitor names and contact information is created.

tasks.description: After the event, import the sign-in data into the CRM as new leads.
tasks.expected_outcome: All open house visitors are added as new contacts in the CRM for follow-up.
